title: Vod
author: Vod
content: Think Pokemon Go combined with beer and a blockchain with nothing to do with crypto!  The real power of crypto is the blockchain, and the first applications to realize this will rival the asteroid mining companies in opportunity.We will be looking for people in each country to manage surveyors, but are initially launching in Canada and the US only.  I'm not hiring on this forum - all applications will be taken on the site.  I'll be posting the link soon.

comments.author: Aliev
comments.body: Glad to see you back, Vod.

comments.author: WhyFhy
comments.body: Have any illustrations? Is it augmented like Pokemon go?Quote from: Aliev on December 05, 2022, 02:01:44 PMGlad to see you back, Vod.Looks like your off to a good start.
